PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13412024-12-16FIN
ActYukon Act
SubjectGovernment of the Yukon Borrowing Limit ** Increase **
PrecisOrder (a) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2020-663 of September 20, 2020; and (b) setting the maximum amount of the aggregate of all borrowings at $1.2 billion for the Government of Yukon.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order (a) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2020-663 of September 20, 2020; and (b) setting the maximum amount of the aggregate of all borrowings at $1.2 billion for the Government of Yukon.
